filename: A filename or directory name. If a filename, it will be created or overwritten. If a directory name, the file wallet.dat will be created or overwritten within that directory.
field1: put in helpful info for field1
help:
Requires wallet support. The backupwallet RPC safely copies wallet.dat to the specified file, which can be a directory or a path with filename. 

 Parameter #1—destination directory or filename. 

 Result—null or error.
